title: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: io/quarkus/deployment/configuration/ConfigurationError

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I am trying to update the quarkus platform version of my application from

` <quarkus.platform.version>3.2.6.Final</quarkus.platform.version>`

to

`<quarkus.platform.version>3.4.2</quarkus.platform.version>`

And I get this error when running `mvn install -Pnative`:
[ERROR] com.fanthreesixty.consumers.TwilioDeliveryStatusConsumerTest.testDeliveryStatusConsumer -- Time elapsed: 0.007 s <<< ERROR!
java.lang.RuntimeException: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: io/quarkus/deployment/configuration/ConfigurationError
at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusTestExtension.throwBootFailureException(QuarkusTestExtension.java:639)
at io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusTestExtension.interceptTestClassConstructor(QuarkusTestExtension.java:711)

I have already tried clearing my .m2


Here is the full stack trace: https://gist.github.com/spieps/5e66ad24c816a1338438ac794a717203

Has anyone ran into this before?? I am pretty confused!

### Expected behavior

`mvn install -Pnative` should build successfully

### Actual behavior


### How to Reproduce?

Upgrading from

`<quarkus.platform.version>3.2.6.Final</quarkus.platform.version>
`
to
`<quarkus.platform.version>3.4.2</quarkus.platform.version>
`
